goal.ch: 讓同學瞭解數值方法本身之數學原理，並能利用已學會之程式語言(如：Matlab, Python...等)加以完成個人的副函示庫，並利用這些函式庫於期末完成一個總程式用於解答該領域之工程問題。
goal.en: Students will learn how to use numerical methods to solve and simulate practical problems with emphasis on analysis, algorithm, and implementation. Specifically, students will possess to be able to perform programming in some basic computer languages, e.g. Matlab, Python, and so on, including writing procedures, importing/exporting data to a file, and working with various data types.

outline.ch:
1. Introduction
Numerical Methods and Problem Solving, Round-Off and Truncation Errors.
2. Roots of Equations
Single equation, Linear Algebraic Equations (1/2):  Gauss Elimination, Linear Algebraic Equations (2/2): LU Decomposition, Iterative Methods for Systems of Equations, Eigenvalues
3. Curve Fitting:
Linear Regression, General Linear least-squares and Nonlinear Regression, Polynomial Interpolation, Piecewise Interpolation.
4. Numerical Integration
Numerical Integration(1/2): Newton-Cotes Formulas, Simpson’s Rules. Numerical Integration(2/2): Romberg Integration, Gauss Quadrature, Adaptive Quadrature.
5. ODES
Initial-value Problems, Adaptive Methods and Stiff System, Boundary-value Problems.
